rule.name: User Upload published
rule.description: Assign points when a user has an uploaded file published in jDownloads (may also be negative to reduce points)

rule.name: User downloads a file
rule.description: Assign points when a registered user downloads a file from jDownloads (may also be negative to reduce points).

rule.name: User downloads a file (uses price)
rule.description: Reduce points when a registered user downloads a file from jDownloads. Uses the 'price' field from the Download for the number of points.

rule.name: Uploader gets points for downloaded files
rule.description: Assign points to the file uploader when a user downloads this file from jDownloads. Uses a fixed number of points as defined here.

rule.name: Uploader gets points for downloaded files (uses price)
rule.description: Assign points to the file uploader when a user downloads this file from jDownloads. Uses the 'price' field from the Download for the number of points.
